Package pl.polsl.student.jakunow552.bestbankingoffer.model

Class PersonalAccountOffer

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.student.jakunow552.bestbankingoffer.model.BankingOffer
pl.polsl.student.jakunow552.bestbankingoffer.model.PersonalAccountOffer
public class PersonalAccountOffer extends BankingOffer
Subcalss - represent personal account offer of the bank (specifies type of the offer by using BankingOffer.setOfferType(java.lang.String) in the constructor).

Extends class: BankingOffer.

Methods added coresponds to specific prameters assigned to the personal account offer.

Version:
1.0-FINAL
Author:
Jakub Nowakowski
